entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers late this evening and overnight with risk of freezing rain. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 6 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High plus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny near noon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 near noon. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 05 January 2023
